title: 96/256/EC: Commission Decision of 26 March 1996 amending Commission Decision 95/190/EC laying down specific conditions for importing fishery and aquaculture products from the Philippines (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 26 March 1996 amending Commission Decision 95/190/EC laying down specific conditions for importing fishery and aquaculture products from the Philippines (Text with EEA relevance) (96/256/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex B of Decision 95/190/EC is replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 March 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 268, 24. 9. 1991, p. 15.
(2) OJ No L 123, 3. 6. 1995, p. 20.
(3) OJ No L 8, 11. 1. 1990, p. 70.
ANNEX
'ANNEX B
